description.text: The creature or object touched becomes invisible. If the recipient is a creature carrying gear, that vanishes, too. If you cast the spell on someone else, neither you nor your allies can see the subject, unless you can normally see invisible things or you employ magic to do so.

sections.Components: V, S, M/DF (an eyelash encased in gum arabic)
sections.Targets: you or a creature or object weighing no more than 100 lbs./level
sections.Saving Throw: Will negates (harmless) or Will negates (harmless, object)
